colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B TZTSUD TZTSU NA DHA RA'I RTOG PA ZHIB MO RDZOGS SO,, ,,RGYA GAR GYI DHI PAm KA RA DANG, BOD KYI LO TZ'A BA RVA RDO RJE GRAGS KYIS BSGYUR BA'O,, ,, ` RMAD 'BYUNG THUGS BSKYED YAB GCIG 'JAM PA'I DBYANGS, ,PHYI NANG GSHIN RJE MA RUNGS KUN 'DUL PHYIR, ,KHYAD CHOS LNGA LDAN 'JIGS BYED SKUR BSTAN PA'I, ,BRGYUD KYI RGYAL PO RDO RJE 'CHANG DBANG GI ,THUGS BSKYED BDUD RTZI'I BCUD MCHOG GLEGS BAM 'DI, ,@005A *, ,PAR DU BKOD PA 'DIS MTSON DGE BA'I MTHUS, ,'DI LA 'BREL THOGS GTZO BYAS 'GRO BA KUN, ,SKU GSUM GO 'PHANG TSE 'DIR THOB PAR SHOG ,GAL TE TSE 'DIR MNGON DU MA GYUR NA, ,NGAN 'GROR MI LTUNG RTEN BZANG KHYAD PAR CAN, ,'BRAL MED THOB NAS SKYE 'PHRENG KUN TU YANG, ,MTSAN LDAN BLA MA DAM PAS RJES BZUNG NAS, ,THUN MONGS LAM SBYANGS DBANG BSKUR ZAB MTHOB, ,KHAS BLANGS DAM TSIG SDOM PA LEGS BSRUNG NAS, ,SKYE BA BDUN DANG BCU DRUG TSUN CHAD DU, ,RING MIN BYANG CHEN MYUR DU THOB PAR SHOG ,THUB DBANG GNYIS PA MI YI RNAM ROL MKHAN, ,BLO BZANG GRAGS PA'I MDO SNGAGS ZUNG 'BREL GYI, ,LUNG RTOGS SNYING KHU RNAM YANG MI NUB PA'I, ,BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN PHYOGS KUN BSGRENGS GYUR CIG ,(CES PA 'DI YANG DAD LDAN RATNAS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, BIKshU N'A THAS SBYAR BA'O, ,)
